claim: Richard Gere starred in an American thriller film.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Red Corner is a 1997 American mystery thriller film directed by Jon Avnet , and starring Richard Gere , Bai Ling and Bradley Whitford .

claim: Richard Gere starred in an American thriller film.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Flock is a 2007 American thriller film directed by Andrew Lau , the co-director of the Infernal Affairs trilogy .
